nn.core

Class Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • nn.core.Unit
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConstantUnit, InputUnit, NeuronUnit

    public abstract class Unit
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for computational elements (``units'') in a NeuralNetwork. Units have to keep track of both outgoing and incoming Connections (the latter are used for backprop).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.List<Connection> incomingConnections 
      java.util.List<Connection> outgoingConnections 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract double getOutput()
      Return the output value of this Unit.
      abstract void run()
      ``Run'' this Unit by recomputing its output value given the values of its inputs.
      abstract void update(double[] inputs, double output, double alpha)
      Update this Unit's weights based on the given input vector, output value, and learning rate.
